docs.text: Welcome to ScalaClean documentation Right now this is pretty much developer notes. Longer term it might be something more. Deploying the docs Docs are created with mkdocs.org from the docs directory. To deploy updated docs run (from the docs directory) mkdocs gh-deploy Custom SemanticDB ScalaC Plugin Location Github scalameta scalaclean Clone this repo. Compiling custom semanticdb-scalac plugin sbt -J-Dscalameta.version=9.9.9-SNAPSHOT scalameta/publishLocal semanticdbScalacCore/publishLocal semanticdbScalacPlugin/publishLocal addCompilerPlugin( org.scalameta % semanticdb-scalac % 9.9.9-SNAPSHOT cross CrossVersion.full) scalacOptions += -Yrangepos The dead code build has been updated to use this version. Key class: SemanticdbTyperComponent - toTextDocument Next steps - determine CSV formats and contents - output these directly.
docs.title: Welcome to ScalaClean documentation

docs.text: sbt -J-Dscalameta.version=9.9.9-SNAPSHOT scalameta/publishLocal semanticdbScalacCore/publishLocal semanticdbScalacPlugin/publishLocal addCompilerPlugin( org.scalameta % semanticdb-scalac % 9.9.9-SNAPSHOT cross CrossVersion.full) scalacOptions += -Yrangepos The dead code build has been updated to use this version.
